name: Commander
blurb: Savvy tacticians that like to lead from the front.
writeup: Some people are born to fight. Others like giving orders. Put these two types of people together and youâ€™ve got a commander.
backgrounds: historical re-enactor, sergeant of the city guard, street gang survivor, ex-gladiator, wilderness scout, cobbler, bouncer, exotic dancer, wargame veteran, squad leader, reformed drunk, and officer of the guard.
